title: permanent highping EUW
body:
since 5.20 my ping is permanently around 90- 140 ( its around 50-60 normally), only if i reconnect, my ping goes down sometimes. I did a pingtest while ingame, and it showed that my ping should be 60 and not 100 or higher. Im preatty sure its the servers fault, i dont have this problem in any other game
http://imgur.com/edit (fps is so low because its in window mode, im playing on a high end pc, it shouldnt be the problem.
thans to everyone who can help me

replies.body: A ping test shows your Ping to a Server of the Ping-Tester not your Ping to the Riot Server.

http://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-en/rIbxgB1E-investigation-of-the-lagspikes-occurred-on-16102015
Riot is probably aware of the issue and tries to fix it. This link leads to the thread if you want any further informations.
